org.openscience.smsd.ring
Class HanserRingFinder

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.smsd.ring.HanserRingFinder

public final class HanserRingFinder
extends java.lang.Object

Finds the Set of all Rings. This is an implementation of the algorithm published in . Some of the comments refer to pseudo code fragments listed in this article. The concept is that a regular molecular graph is first converted into a path graph (refer PathGraph.java), i.e. a graph where the edges are actually paths. This can list several nodes that are implicitly connecting the two nodes between the path is formed (refer PathEdge.java). The paths that join source and sink node are step by step fused and the joined nodes are deleted from the path graph (collapsed path). What remains is a graph of paths that have the same start and endpoint and are thus rings (source=sink=ring).

Author:
Syed Asad Rahman 2009-2013
